title: Guardian Golem
summaries: The Guardian Golem is a Hardmode, post-Golem light pet-summoning item that spawns a Toy Golem light pet upon being used or equipped. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Toy Golem emits a rocket exhaust to catch up to them. The Guardian Golem has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by Golem in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a toy golem to light your way
